summary: A troubled youth's singing sets New Orleans rockin'. With a sweet girl to love him and nightclubbers cheering, it seems he will shake off his past and head for the top. But will a mobster and his man-trap moll snare him in a life of crime?
cast: Elvis Presley|Carolyn Jones|Walter Matthau|Dolores Hart|Dean Jagger|Liliane Montevecchi|Vic Morrow|Paul Stewart|Jan Shepard|Brian G. Hutton|Jack Grinnage|Dick Winslow|Raymond Bailey|Leon Tyler|Val Avery|Hazel Boyne|Sam Buffington|Boyd Cabeen|Candy Candido|Lilyan Chauvin|Charles Evans|Franklyn Farnum|Barbara Gayle|Ned Glass|Cliff Gleaves|Gavin Gordon|Reita Green|Dorothy Hack|Helene Hatch|Kay Haydn|Trustin Howard|John Indrisano|Eugene Jackson|Jackie Joseph|Gustave Lax|Alexander Lockwood|Thomas Martin|Walter Merrill|Scotty Moore|Ron Nyman|Jacqueline Park|Murray Pollack|Greg Rhinelander|Ziva Rodann|Ric Roman|Tony Russel|Bernard Sell|Susanne Sidney|Blanche Thomas|Mina Vaughn|Kitty White|Chalky Williams|Fred Winston|Judith Woodbury
